item.title: Amber Heard weighs in on Blake-Baldoni controversy as netizens slam Justin's faux ‘male feminist’ persona; read - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Amber Heard Comments on Blake Lively-Justin Baldoni Controversy

Date: Dec 24, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The ongoing controversy surrounding Justin Baldoni and Blake Lively stemming from the film It Ends With Us has attracted attention, with Heard speaking out on social media misinformation.

  • Blake Lively accuses Justin Baldoni of orchestrating a smear campaign against her.
  • Lively filed a complaint alleging sexual harassment and a hostile work environment.
  • Heard criticized the devastating impact of social media misinformation.
  • Netizens are questioning Baldoni's male feminist persona amidst the drama.
“Social media is the absolute personification of the classic saying ‘A lie travels halfway around the world before truth can get its boots on.’” - Amber Heard

The unfolding drama highlights issues of credibility and the facade of feminism in the entertainment industry.

item.title: Border 2: Filming Begins For Sunny Deol, Varun Dhawan, Diljit Dosanjh Starrer; First Pic From Sets Out - News18
item.description:
Filming Begins for 'Border 2' Starring Sunny Deol and Varun Dhawan

Publication Date: December 24, 2024

Source: News18

Sunny Deol and a star-studded cast have officially begun shooting for 'Border 2', the highly-anticipated sequel of the iconic 1997 war film.

  • 'Border 2' is directed by Anurag Singh and backed by producers Bhushan Kumar, JP Dutta, and Nidhi Dutta.
  • The film promises action, drama, and patriotism, scheduled for release on January 23, 2026.
  • It features Sunny Deol reprising his role from the original film alongside Varun Dhawan, Diljit Dosanjh, and Ahan Shetty.
  • The original film depicted the heroic actions of Indian soldiers during the 1971 Longewala battle.
“The cameras are rolling for Border 2! This promises action, drama, and patriotism like never before.”

The revival of 'Border' highlights the ongoing appreciation for patriotic stories in Indian cinema, making 'Border 2' one of the most awaited films of 2026.

item.title: "Did You Know...": What Cops Asked Allu Arjun In 'Pushpa 2' Stampede Case - NDTV
item.description:
Investigation into Allu Arjun's Role in 'Pushpa 2' Stampede

Date: Recent
Source: NDTV

Hyderabad Police have questioned actor Allu Arjun following a tragic stampede at a theater during a premiere of 'Pushpa 2', resulting in the death of a 35-year-old woman and severe injuries to her child.

Key points include:

  • Allu Arjun was questioned about police permission for his appearance at the event.
  • He was arrested and later released on interim bail.
  • His presence reportedly caused a stampede as fans surged to see him.
  • The police have faced criticism regarding their handling of the situation.
“Just because he is an actor... he cannot be held like this,” cited the Telangana High Court in support of Allu Arjun.

The incident has sparked protests and divided public opinion, with mixed reactions regarding the actor's accountability.

item.title: ‘Pushpa 2 The Rule’ stampede: Producer of Allu Arjun mass entertainer donates ₹50 lakh to the victim’s fa - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Producer of 'Pushpa 2 The Rule' Donates ₹50 Lakh to Victim's Family After Stampede

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

After a tragic stampede during the release of 'Pushpa 2 The Rule', producer Allu Arjun has stepped forward to support the victim's family by donating ₹50 lakh.

  • Stampede occurred during the film's premiere.
  • Allu Arjun pledged ₹50 lakh to the family of the deceased.
  • The incident has raised concerns about crowd control at large events.
'In times of tragedy, we must come together to support those in need.'

This donation highlights the importance of responsibility among filmmakers and event organizers in ensuring the safety of their audiences.

item.title: Sunny Deol, Varun Dhawan, Diljit Dosanjh, Ahan Shetty starrer Border 2 goes on floor; see pic - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Filming Begins for 'Border 2'

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Bollywood Hungama

The cameras are rolling for the much-anticipated sequel Border 2, featuring a star-studded lineup including Sunny Deol and Varun Dhawan. Fans are excited as production officially begins.

  • Filming has officially begun for the sequel Border 2.
  • The movie stars Sunny Deol, Varun Dhawan, Diljit Dosanjh, and Ahan Shetty.
  • Directed by Anurag Singh, the film promises action and emotional depth.
  • It is set against a backdrop of patriotism and is based on true events from the Indo-Pakistan war.
  • Scheduled for release on January 23, 2026.
“Also featured a deep insight into the infamous Indo-Pakistan war of 1971 which was known as the Battle of Longewala.”

This sequel aims to deliver a grand cinematic experience and further the legacy of the original film.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE! Nana Patekar on ‘Gadar 2’ fame Anil Sharma's Vanvaas: ‘I don’t like crowds, huge buildings, cars, I am scared…’ | Not Just Bollywood - Firstpost
item.description:
Nana Patekar on ‘Gadar 2’ fame Anil Sharma's Vanvaas: ‘I don’t like crowds, huge buildings, cars, I am scared…’

Date: December 2024 | Source: Not Just Bollywood

Nana Patekar shares insights about his life choices, discussing his film Vanvaas and comparing rural life to the city's fast pace.

  • Nana Patekar expresses a preference for rural life over urban environments.
  • He discusses the emotional depth of father-child relationships as showcased in Vanvaas.
  • Both Patekar and director Anil Sharma emphasize the importance of familial bonds.
  • The film presents humor wrapped in an intense and serious theme.
Nana: “I don’t like crowds, huge buildings, cars, I am literally scared of all these.”

This exclusive interview highlights Nana Patekar’s philosophy on life and cinema, underscoring the relevance of family ties in modern society.

item.title: Allu Arjun stampede case: Actor appears before Chikkadpally police for quizzing on stampede during Pushpa-2 - The Hindu
item.description:
Allu Arjun Appears for Police Questioning in Pushpa-2 Stampede Case

Date: December 24, 2024 Source: The Hindu

Actor Allu Arjun visited the Chikkadpally Police Station in Hyderabad for questioning regarding the recent stampede during the Pushpa-2 screening that resulted in a fatality.

  • Allu Arjun arrived at the police station around 11 a.m. on December 24, 2024.
  • The stampede occurred on December 4, claiming the life of a 35-year-old woman and left her son critically injured.
  • Police had anticipated a large crowd and set up barriers to separate the public and media.
  • Arjun received a notice to appear for questioning, being named as accused number 11 in the case.
  • He was previously arrested on December 13 and spent one night in jail before being released on bail.
“The case is under investigation and your presence is quite essential…” - B. Raju Naik, Inspector of Chikkadpally Police Station

The situation underscores the serious nature of the incident and the ongoing investigation surrounding it.

item.title: India's highest paid villain charged ₹200 crore for one film, more than even Shah Rukh, Salman, Prabhas, Ranbir Kapoor - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Yash Becomes India's Highest Paid Villain with ₹200 Crore Fee

Date: Dec 24, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Kannada superstar Yash has set a new record as the highest-paid villain in Indian cinema, earning ₹200 crore for his role in the upcoming adaptation of Ramayana.

  • Yash's fee surpasses Bollywood superstars such as Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, and Prabhas.
  • His role in Ramayana sees him portray Ravana, elevating him to the highest-paid antagonist position in Indian film history.
  • This fee is significantly more than typical Bollywood hero salaries, which hover around ₹100-150 crore.
  • Yash's success marks a shift in the Bollywood landscape where villains are now earning higher than heroes.
“The ₹200 crore Yash is taking home for Ramayana is no mean feat.”

This milestone reflects changing dynamics in the film industry, highlighting the growing value of antagonist roles.

item.title: Shyam Benegal: How Jawaharlal Nehru, Indira Gandhi influenced the late filmmaker’s filmography - The Hindu
item.description:
Shyam Benegal: How Jawaharlal Nehru, Indira Gandhi influenced the late filmmaker’s filmography

Published: December 24, 2024 11:06 am IST | Source: The Hindu

The passing of Shyam Benegal, a titan of Indian parallel cinema, marks the end of an era. Known for his ability to weave his extraordinary oeuvre with a biting social realism, Benegal’s career was deeply intertwined with the political and cultural fabric of India. His encounters with Jawaharlal Nehru, Indira Gandhi, and the Indian political scene seemed to have been influential in shaping his work.

  • Benegal's meeting with Nehru in the mid-1950s left a lasting impression on him.
  • His series Bharat Ek Khoj debuted based on Nehru's book The Discovery of India.
  • Interacting with Indira Gandhi, he experienced both admiration and criticism.
  • Gandhi intervened to lift the ban on Benegal's film Nishant, helping his career.
  • Benegal reflected on Gandhi's struggles with her father's absence and her early political image.
“He asked if he could join us at the lunch table,” Benegal recalled about Nehru. “His attractiveness was undeniable. That’s why I made Bharat Ek Khoj.”

Benegal passed away due to kidney-related ailments in Mumbai on December 23, 2024, at the age of 90.

item.title: Christopher Nolan’s upcoming film’s title and cast officially revealed - 123telugu
item.description:
Christopher Nolan’s Upcoming Film Title and Cast Officially Revealed

Published on Dec 24, 2024 | Source: 123Telugu

Christopher Nolan’s next film has been confirmed, featuring a star-studded cast and new film technology.

  • The film is titled “The Odyssey” and is an official adaptation of Homer’s epic poem.
  • It will feature a cast including Tom Holland, Matt Damon, Anne Hathaway, Zendaya, Lupita Nyongo’o, Robert Pattinson, and Charlize Theron.
  • Filming will take place globally using IMAX film technology.
  • The film explores themes such as heroism, loyalty, and deceit.
  • Set to release in cinemas on July 17, 2026.
“The Odyssey chronicles the story of the Greek hero Odysseus and his journey home after the Trojan War.”

Christopher Nolan’s new project promises to be an epic cinematic event that will attract audiences worldwide.

item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 1 Advance Booking: 119% Jump In Ticket Sales But Far From Fighter & Bollywood Biggies Of 2024! [1 Day To Go] - Koimoi
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 1 Advance Booking: 119% Jump In Ticket Sales But Far From Fighter & Bollywood Bi

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Koimoi

Varun Dhawan is turning our Santa this Christmas season as he is all set to greet us with Baby John. Co-starring Keerthy Suresh, the action thriller is enjoying good hype across the nation. Advance booking sales are also showing positive signs and are growing with each passing day.

Pre-Sales for Opening Day

Baby John has registered advance booking sales of 1.22 crores, with Maharashtra contributing 19% of the total pre-sales. Nearly 40K tickets have been sold, marking a 119% increase in ticket sales in the last 24 hours.

Baby John vs top advance sales of 2024

Currently, Baby John will not make it to the top 5 advanced booking sales of 2024 due to required sales being out of reach.

  1. Pushpa 2: 91.24 crores
  2. Kalki 2898 AD: 55.30 crores
  3. Devara: 49.90 crores
  4. The GOAT – 28.90 cr gross
  5. Guntur Kaaram – 24.90 crores

The action thriller's success is heavily reliant on word-of-mouth, aiming for a solid opening.

Advance Booking At National Chains

Baby John has sold 25K tickets at major national cinema chains, and with one day left until release, it is expected to see further growth.

Note: Box office numbers based on estimates and have not been independently verified by Koimoi.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Savi admits her love for Rajat - India Forums
item.description:
Savi Confesses Her Love for Rajat on Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin

Published: Tuesday, December 24, 2024 at 4:57 AM

The latest episode of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin features emotional developments as Anubhav confesses his feelings to Savi, who is in love with Rajat, leading to tension and misunderstandings.

  • Anubhav encourages Lucky to take responsibility while handling media and personal issues.
  • Savi humorously flirts with Anubhav, causing Rajat to feel heartbroken from misunderstanding their interaction.
  • Rajat's emotional turmoil leads him to drink heavily and act destructively.
  • As Christmas decorations are prepared, family dynamics and Rajat's withdrawal are explored.
  • The episode concludes with Rajat facing scrutiny and anger regarding his recent successes.
“If I had acted sooner, things might have been different.” - Anubhav

In conclusion, the episode delves into themes of unrequited love, emotional distress, and family relationships, setting the stage for future conflicts in the storyline.

item.title: Allu Arjun appears before Hyderabad police in Pushpa 2 stampede case: 10 points - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Arjun Appears Before Police in Pushpa 2 Stampede Case

Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

On December 4, a tragic stampede occurred during the screening of 'Pushpa 2' at the Sandhya Theatre in Hyderabad, resulting in the death of a 35-year-old woman. Telugu actor Allu Arjun has been summoned by the Hyderabad police as part of the ongoing investigation.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested on December 13 and released on bail on December 14.
  • A protest was held on December 22 at his residence demanding justice for the deceased woman's family.
  • The police have filed a case against Allu Arjun, his security, and theatre management.
  • Political fallout ensued, with Telangana Chief Minister blaming the actor for the tragedy.
  • Allu Arjun expressed his condolences, calling the incident a tragic accident and denying any allegations of misconduct.
  • The producers of 'Pushpa 2' have compensated the victim's family with ₹50 lakh.
"It was a tragic accident, and my heart goes out to the family. I've been monitoring the condition of the injured child, and I'm relieved to hear he is improving." - Allu Arjun

This incident has raised significant concerns regarding safety measures and accountability in crowded events.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Director Sukumar Wants To QUIT Cinema Amid Allu Arjun's Stampede Controversy | Watch - News18
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Director Sukumar Considers Leaving Cinema Amid Allu Arjun's Stampede Controversy

Date: December 24, 2024 • Source: News18

Pushpa 2: The Rule director Sukumar left everyone shocked recently when he joked about leaving films during an event in Hyderabad. This comment comes amid legal troubles surrounding Allu Arjun, who is facing scrutiny after a stampede at the Pushpa 2 premiere resulted in tragedy.

  • Sukumar expressed a desire to quit cinema jokingly during a recent event.
  • Allu Arjun is involved in a legal case after a stampede at his film's premiere led to the death of a woman.
  • The incident occurred when a crowd became uncontrollable as Allu Arjun greeted fans.
  • Protests occurred outside Allu Arjun's home demanding justice and property was vandalized.
"The crowd went out of control after Allu Arjun stepped out of his car to greet fans attending the premiere."

This situation highlights the ongoing challenges filmmakers and actors face and the serious consequences of public events.

item.title: Justin Baldoni's prestigious award for woman advocacy taken back days after Blake Lively's sexual harassment lawsuit - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Justin Baldoni's Award Rescinded After Blake Lively's Harassment Lawsuit

Date: Dec 24, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Justin Baldoni, known for his role in 'It Ends With Us', has lost a prestigious award he received for advocating for women and girls, following a sexual harassment lawsuit filed against him by co-star Blake Lively.

  • Baldoni received the Voices of Solidarity Award on December 9 from Vital Voices for his advocacy work.
  • The award was rescinded after Lively’s lawsuit alleging Baldoni's “disturbing” conduct.
  • The lawsuit includes damaging communications from Baldoni to his publicists regarding Lively.
  • Blake Lively has garnered substantial support from the film community, including statements from Sony Pictures and SAG-AFTRA.
  • Baldoni has been dropped by his agency, WME.
“The communications among Mr. Baldoni and his publicists included in the lawsuit... are, alone, contrary to the values of Vital Voices and the spirit of the Award.” - Vital Voices

This incident highlights significant issues surrounding sexual harassment in the entertainment industry and the importance of supporting victims.

item.title: Allu Arjun is touched by Yash Raj Films' gesture after Pushpa 2 beats Pathaan box office collection: ‘So graceful’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Arjun Appreciates Yash Raj Films After Pushpa 2 Tops Pathaan's Box Office Collection

Date: Dec 24, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Allu Arjun expressed gratitude towards Yash Raj Films after his film Pushpa 2: The Rule exceeded the box office collections of Shah Rukh Khan's Pathaan. YRF acknowledged this achievement through social media, emphasizing the spirit of competition in cinema.

  • Pushpa 2: The Rule has earned ₹1074.85 crore, with ₹689.4 crore from its Hindi version.
  • Arjun's film surpassed Pathaan's ₹543.09 crore, which included ₹524.53 crore from the Hindi market.
  • YRF praised the Pushpa 2 team, calling it a historic achievement.
  • Allu Arjun responded graciously on X, expressing humility and thankfulness.
  • The success of Pushpa 2 marks a significant moment in the box office dynamic within Indian cinema.
“Records are meant to be broken and new ones push everyone towards excellence.” - Yash Raj Films

The acknowledgment by Yash Raj Films highlights the competitive yet respectful nature of Bollywood, as films from different industries aim for greater heights.

item.title: Yash Raj Films gives a loud shoutout to Allu Arjun starrer Pushpa 2 – The Rule over its ‘record-breaking’ success; says, “Fire nahi Wildfire” - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Yash Raj Films gives a loud shoutout to Allu Arjun starrer Pushpa 2 – The Rule over its ‘record-breaking’ success; says, “Fire nahi Wildfire”

Publication Date: December 23, 2024
Source: Bollywood Hungama

This year, Bollywood has seen many successes, but none like the record-breaking love for Pushpa 2 – The Rule. The film has received applause from audiences across the country, leading Yash Raj Films to publicly congratulate the film's team.

  • Pushpa 2 has broken multiple box office records.
  • Yash Raj Films issued a congratulatory message on social media, emphasizing the film's historic success.
  • Allu Arjun expressed gratitude towards YRF's gesture, calling it graceful and humbling.
  • The film, featuring Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil, portrays the escapades of a sandalwood smuggler.
“Congratulations to the entire #Pushpa2TheRule team for rewriting history books. Fire nahi, Wildfire!!!!!” - Yash Raj Films

The success of Pushpa 2 highlights the evolving landscape of Indian cinema, where regional films are breaking barriers and achieving national acclaim.

Varun Dhawan’s fans have been eagerly waiting for his upcoming movie, Baby John. The film has received an overwhelming response with advance bookings collecting Rs 67.86 crore.

item.description:
WWE Raw Results 12/23 - Drew McIntyre & Seth Rollins Appear, Dexter Lumis Squares Off With The Miz

Wrestling Inc. provides coverage of WWE Raw events held on December 23, featuring appearances by Drew McIntyre and Seth Rollins, as well as matches including Dexter Lumis versus The Miz and the Women’s Intercontinental Championship Tournament.

  • Drew McIntyre and Seth Rollins make significant appearances, addressing their rivalry with CM Punk and Sami Zayn.
  • Dexter Lumis competes against The Miz, amidst tension with the Authors of Pain.
  • The Women’s Intercontinental Championship Tournament features a critical triple threat match.

“The real villains in WWE are CM Punk and Roman Reigns.” - Drew McIntyre

The December 23 WWE Raw provided fans with thrilling wrestling action, memorable confrontations, and pivotal developments in ongoing storylines.

item.title: Sandhya 70mm stampede victim Sritej’s latest health bulletin - 123telugu
item.description:
Health Update on Sritej, Victim of Sandhya 70mm Stampede

Published on: Dec 24, 2024 8:30 am IST

Sritej, a 13-year-old boy who suffered severe injuries in a stampede at the Sandhya 70mm theater during the premiere of Pushpa 2, is currently receiving treatment at KIMS Cuddles in Secunderabad. His latest health bulletin indicates significant improvements.

  • Sritej is maintaining stable vital parameters.
  • He is now off oxygen and ventilator support.
  • Fever spikes have decreased and white blood cell counts are showing improvement.
  • He is tolerating feeds well.
  • Tragically, Sritej lost his mother, Revathi, in the stampede.
  • Allu Arjun’s team and government officials are in regular contact with Sritej’s father regarding his recovery.
  • Allu Arjun was arrested and later released on bail related to the stampede incident.
“He continues to be off oxygen and Ventilator. His fever spikes have reduced and blood investigations have been showing serially improving WBC and CRP trends. He is tolerating feeds well.”

The community and fans are optimistic about Sritej's recovery as he continues to receive care and support during this challenging time.

item.title: Rahul Vaidya reacts to being blocked by Virat Kohli on Instagram; says, 'I still don't understand why' - The Times of India
item.description:
Rahul Vaidya reacts to being blocked by Virat Kohli on Instagram; says, "I still don't understand why"

Date: December 12, 2024

Source: Times of India

In a surprising turn of events, singer Rahul Vaidya revealed that he has been blocked by Indian cricket star Virat Kohli on Instagram, leaving him perplexed.

  • Rahul Vaidya expressed his confusion about the blocking incident, stating he doesn't understand why Kohli would do this.
  • During a recent paparazzi interaction, he stated, "Aaj tak samajh mein nahi aaya, bhai ne block kyun kiya".
  • Vaidya, a well-known singer and music composer, recently gained fame through Indian Idol and Bigg Boss 14.
  • Aside from Vaidya, Kohli and Anushka Sharma are reportedly planning to move to London permanently with their children.
  • Kohli's childhood coach confirmed that the family has been spending a significant amount of time in London after the birth of their second child.
  • On a career note, Vaidya recently showcased his humor on Laughter Chef Season 1 and is expected to return for the second season.
“Aaj tak samajh mein nahi aaya, bhai ne block kyun kiya” - Rahul Vaidya

This incident highlights the curiosity and intrigue surrounding relationships in the public eye, especially among celebrities.
